Paypal has decided to freeze and refuse payments to a load of live performers doing adult shows for people.

Another school shooting in the USA has occurred, sadly two students have been reported dead from the event.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6025030][color=#FFFFFF]MH17 flight that was shot down might have been a hit directed by the Kremlin[/color][/url] - [mention=947940]

Frnkie Kny thinks that discord is for noobs, what do you think?

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6025427][color=#FFFFFF]When life hits rock bottom[/color][/url] - [mention=1297408]

[align=center][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/businessnews-bear.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white]Renewed Tariff Threats Against China[/color][/b]
In his speech at the economic club of New York, United States president Donald trump renewed tariff threats against China while at the same time taking credit for the economic boom being experienced by the U.S. The trade war between the U.S and China have caused both states to increase the tariff on each other’s goods. While Mr. Trump mentioned the positives of the tough trade policies to the American people, he failed to mention any of the negatives. Beijing commented on this and stated that one of the things that they would expect in order to end the trade war between the two countries is lowered tariffs.  [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.nytimes.com/2019/11/12/business/trump-trade-economy.html]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]The S&P 500 and Nasdaq stall[/color][/b]
The S&P and dow jones indexes stalled on Friday after President Donald J.  Trump wavered over wether the tariffs in the ongoing trade war with China will be rolled back. The president had told reporters that the U.S government had not yet agreed to lift the tariffs. This contrasted what a spokesman for the Chinese military had said earlier that week. The Chinese Official had said that the two governments had indeed agreed to lift the tariffs. The NASDAQ however gained value on the back of the increase in share price of Microsoft Corp and Qualcomm Inc. Nonetheless, the S&P 500 was on track for its fifth straight week of growth and the Nasdaq was on tack for a sixth week of growth. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.nytimes.com/2019/11/12/business/trump-trade-economy.html]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Stocks  To Climb To a Record High[/color][/b]
U.S equities have been climbing all week and they are expected t increase even more in the coming days as everyone anticipates the end of the trade war between China and the United States. The Trump administration in liaison with the Chinese government has been in discussion to come up with a palatable agreement that will benefit both nations. The trade wars have seen tariffs being raised for goods in both countries. The share index for top registered big 500 fortune companies increased by 0.9 percent. Among the best performers are the health-care stocks, Boeing and the FAA (Federal Aviation Administration).  [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.washingtonpost.com/business/stocks-climb-to-record-highs-on-growing-trade-optimism/2019/11/15/bfcc81de-06f8-11ea-b17d-8b867891d39d_story.html]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[align=center][img]https://www.hackforums.news/assets/v4/3.png[/img][/align]


      

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2890436][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/vibes-pikachu.png[/img][/url][/align]


[b][color=#ccffff]Horoscopes[/color][/b] / [i]Nov 18, 2019 - Nov 24, 2019[/i]

[list]
[*][b][color=#cc3333]Aries ♈[/color][/b]
[i]"The focus on your sector of shared assets and business increases when determined Mars moves into Scorpio on Monday. Its presence here energizes the area and encourages you to be proactive about any ongoing issues.

This week brings a further shift as quicksilver Mercury turns direct in the same zone on Wednesday. You could see a gradual improvement in financial and business matters, especially if they’ve been subject to delays.

There is another change as the sun enters Sagittarius for a four-week stay on Friday, encouraging you to look to far horizons and traverse new terrain. If you’ve had doubts about your abilities or self-worth, the weekend could find you feeling more buoyant.

However, you could also feel restless, and this could reach a peak on Sunday. You might have an urge to ignore any limitations and do what you want regardless of what others might think."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=1]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#ff99ff]Taurus ♉[/color][/b]
[i]"The intensity may be about to ramp up in your relationships as dynamic Mars enters this zone on Monday. Do you need to clear the air? You’ll be very tempted, but try not to come on too strong if you want to keep the relationship intact. If you don’t mind one way or the other, then tell it like it is.

If you’ve been on the receiving end of mixed messages or misunderstandings, things can begin to change as talkative Mercury turns direct midweek. You’ll have an opportunity to finalize any deals or agreements you’ve been working on, too. Give yourself a week or so, though, so that Mercury can get back on track.

Are you ready to get rid of those skeletons in the closet? The sun’s move into Sagittarius and a more intense zone on Friday could see you ready to do some emotional housecleaning.

This weekend, you might be in an independent mood and eager to do your own thing. Try to be sensitive to other people’s feelings, though."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=2]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#66cc33]Gemini ♊[/color][/b]
[i]"Vitality can increase this week as powerful Mars moves into your lifestyle and wellness zone on Monday. It will be here for around six weeks, so this is your chance to get organized, as well as initiate a new exercise routine or get a diet back on track.

You could be quite competitive at work, especially if you run your own business. Try to pace yourself, Gemini, particularly as the week gathers pace. As Mars moves to oppose electric Uranus over the weekend, a restless streak could see you taking shortcuts that might backfire.

The good news this week is that Mercury, your personal planet, turns direct midweek after its retrograde phase, which could make life easier. As it gets back on track, there should be fewer delays and less likelihood of misunderstandings.

The sun glides into your relationship zone on Friday, and you could benefit from some insights into your closest bonds. Plus, the weekend brings a wonderful opportunity for a special evening out."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=3]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#3399ff]Cancer ♋[/color][/b]
[i]"Get ready to enjoy life as proactive Mars moves into your leisure sector on Monday. This zone is also linked with creative activities, competitive sports, romance, and your confidence about expressing yourself. Over the coming weeks, you have a chance to initiate activities that you might really enjoy. And getting away from the everyday routine and focusing on those things you love to do most can also be very healing.

Has a romance slowed to a snail’s pace? If so, with flirtatious Mercury in your romance sector pushing ahead midweek, things can begin to improve. Allow this to occur naturally, though.

The presence of the radiant sun in your lifestyle zone on Friday can give you a boost, and it may bring insights into what is working and what isn’t. This can be a chance to streamline your affairs and get back on track with your wellness routine.

Go easy over the weekend, though, because a clash of perspectives could cause a rift."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=4]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#ff9933]Leo ♌[/color][/b]
[i]"With fiery Mars moving into your domestic sector this week, you’ll be ready to get your place in order. If you haven’t decluttered in some while, who knows what secrets you may find as you delve into dark corners and dusty cupboards? The upshot can be more space and a freeing up of emotional energy that brings more happiness and money your way.

If life has been a tad trying over recent weeks, it could be due to quicksilver Mercury’s retrograde phase. This planet turns direct on Wednesday, which means a gradual end to any frustrations and delays.

Ready for some fun? As the fiery sun moves into your leisure zone, you might be more inclined to get out and about. Romantic and creative opportunities await you, but most of all, you might feel like doing something adventurous.

The weekend could bring unexpected demands or responsibilities your way. You may want to rebel, but it’s better to attend to them."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=5]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#339933]Virgo ♍[/color][/b]
[i]"Your thoughts and conversations could gain passionate intensity as potent Mars moves into your sector of talk and thought on Monday. If you should get into an argument or find yourself in conflict with someone this week, the likelihood of finding a compromise may be slim. Fiery Mars opposes maverick Uranus over the days ahead, so you might prefer to stand your ground rather than give an inch.

Thoughtful Mercury, your guide planet, turns direct in your communication zone midweek, which could see a turnaround in your affairs. Deals that were held up may now begin to show signs of movement.

You’ll also benefit from the movement of the sun into your home zone, where it will stay for four weeks. This illuminating and healing influence can shed light on domestic issues. Are you ready for a get-together? A Venus-Jupiter link over the weekend could make it very worthwhile."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=6]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#3366ff]Libra ♎[/color][/b]
[i]"As sizzling Mars enters your money zone on Monday, you may find that cash flows in and rolls out just as quickly. You might earn more, but chances are good that you’ll spend more, too. However, you’ll also have the incentive to sort out your affairs and get your finances in order. If you want to earn more cash, this is certainly the time to do so.

If you’ve experienced delays in receiving funds, things can begin to move forward this week as dealmaker Mercury turns direct. You may find that things begin to pick up and progress in this area becomes possible.

If you’re ready to tell it like it is, you could be more outspoken than usual once the sun moves into Sagittarius on Friday. Its presence here could see you being quite blunt and enjoying it, too.

Over the weekend, you could rebel against financial limits by wanting to spend more, so go easy."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=7]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#8B0000]Scorpio ♏[/color][/b]
[i]"As focused Mars powers into your sign on Monday for a six-week stay, you’ll feel like you are well and truly back in the driver’s seat. Your desires may be stronger than usual, and you’ll be ready to do what it takes to fulfill them, even if it means pushing for what you want.

At the same time, if you’ve been frustrated by the slow pace of events over recent weeks, this could change as messenger Mercury turns direct on Wednesday. You’ll find that things begin to come together and progress is slowly being made. It’s time to dust off those plans and get moving.

Money matters get a boost as the sun moves into your financial zone on Friday for a four-week stay. You could gain clarity on how to improve your situation and increase your income.

Go easy over the weekend, because focused Mars opposes emancipated Uranus and you and another could clash."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=8]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#FFFF00]Sagittarius ♐[/color][/b]
[i]"Your spiritual zone may be stirred up by the presence of potent Mars as it enters this sector for a six-week stay on Monday. Situations that have lain dormant may surface. These could seem fated, and they might encourage you to rethink your plans and strategy. Watch out for signs and coincidences, too, because these could point the way ahead, especially if you’re wondering what your next step should be.

This is a good time to find closure on events and relationships. Also consider hiring the services of a life coach or teacher who can help you make the most of your life and overall potential.

Has life been frustrating? This has likely not been helped by articulate Mercury in its retrograde phase. It turns direct this week, so you’ll gradually begin to see some progress.

Finally, the sun’s move into your sign on Friday is a big event that brings vitality and encouragement."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=9]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#663333]Capricorn ♑[/color][/b]
[i]"Your social life perks up early on as dynamic Mars moves into this zone for a six-week stay. This could find you being very proactive about making new friends, connecting with the right people, and moving in new circles.

And with lively Mercury turning direct midweek after its retrograde phase, you’ll also find that misunderstandings and complications in key relationships begin to ease. Still, it would be wise to take a little extra care around Wednesday, because Mercury can be a trickster as it changes direction.

The focus on a more private zone is enhanced as the sun moves into Sagittarius on Friday. You’re entering a time of year when you feel more inclined to take a step back. This is your chance to review your priorities and plan for the coming twelve months.

Are you looking for romance? The weekend could bring a touch of chaos in this regard as an encounter leaves you wanting much more."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=10]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#9966ff]Aquarius ♒[/color][/b]
[i]"Career goals and ambitions may be stirred up this week as feisty Mars powers into your sector of responsibility on Monday. As it moves into the sign of Scorpio, you could be very determined to accomplish something important to you. The presence of warrior Mars can encourage you to keep going until you succeed, in spite of any obstacles.

It’s also helpful that dealmaker Mercury turns direct midweek, making delays and unexpected snafus less likely. You can now move ahead with negotiating deals and agreements.

Things look very positive for you as the sun eases into your social sector on Friday. This might encourage you to mix and mingle and bring some exciting opportunities your way.

The weekend might need careful handling, because a blend of energies involving dynamic Mars and restless Uranus could incline you to make some impulsive moves. It would be better to take things one step at a time than rush into anything."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=11]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#cccc66]Pisces ♓[/color][/b]
[i]"Are you ready to travel? As determined Mars moves into your travel zone on Monday, you might have a desire to explore new places and enjoy doing so. This lively influence could also encourage you to reach out for new opportunities that take you out of your comfort zone.

There will be less likelihood of delays, lost paperwork, and unexpected detours, too, as chatty Mercury pushes forward midweek. It can be a little unpredictable as it changes direction, though, so go easy for a few days around Wednesday.

Career matters receive a boost as the sun enters your sector of goals and ambitions on Friday. This is your opportunity to take stock and consider your priorities. Once you know where you’re going, you’ll be more likely to get down to work.

The weekend could see you making an instant decision that might not be helpful. Give yourself time to think about the consequences."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=12]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]
[/list]
